attributes.additional_details:
im sure all parents want the best education for there children, but now there's more to this lockdown. children are struggling not just with lockdown, but with not interacting with children there own age there not getting the education they deserve also my own son has missed much of school because of his own health issues the government was prepared to keep schools open before vaccine roll out why not now? 
our kids are the future of this world and this government is killing there chances

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572322
